sub_title: PR Communications Lead H&M Central Europe – Fashion Communications
summary:
"In both my work and my social life I’m tremendously passionate and driven. I love to get the most out of my surroundings and myself; seek challenges and adventures, making use of my curiosity.
Whose, what’s and whereabouts have my interests, but my passion for AFC Ajax and self-development are not to exceed."

Lisa is a PR and Strategic Communication professional currently working at H&M as Strategic Communication lead for all Fashion Campaigns. She is responsible for developing the PR/Communication strategies for Germany, The Netherlands, Switzerland, Austria and Slovenia. The campaigns include womenswear, menswear, young female and lifestyle - in the field of both PR and Influencer management.

Over 9 years of experience in the fashion and retail industry with a Bachelor Degree in Fashion & Branding; Lisa gained knowledge at both commercial brands and creative foundations. With a clear and realistic view on brands, brand development and a future-proof approach to media - specifically in the commercial retail and lifestyle industry she's always looking for creative opportunities within communication.
